sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Strategic Collaboration with Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited to Develop AI-Powered Manned eVTOL Aircraft for Disaster Response and Geological Exploration
feed.summary: GIBO announced a strategic collaboration with Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited to co-develop AI-powered manned eVTOL aircraft for various critical missions, including disaster response, search-and-rescue, and geological exploration. This partnership leverages GIBO's AI compute engine and autonomous sensing with Japan Benling's aviation expertise to create intelligent aircraft capable of operating in challenging environments where traditional vehicles struggle. The collaboration aims to address a rapidly expanding eVTOL market for public safety and exploration, projected to reach $6-7 billion by 2030.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Strategic Collaboration with Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited to Develop AI-Powered Manned eVTOL Aircraft for Disaster Response and Geological Exploration
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. has partnered with Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited to develop AI-powered manned electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft. These advanced aircraft will be designed for critical missions such as disaster response, geological exploration, and search-and-rescue in hazardous or remote environments. The collaboration will leverage GIBO's AI technologies for autonomous assistance and Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited's expertise in aviation structures and propulsion.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Strategic Collaboration with Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited to Develop AI-Powered Manned eVTOL Aircraft for Disaster Response and Geological Exploration
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced a strategic collaboration with Japan Benling Zhushi Clubs Limited to develop AI-powered manned eVTOL aircraft. This partnership aims to create intelligent aviation platforms for disaster response, search-and-rescue, and geological exploration by combining GIBO's AI technologies with Japan Benling's aviation engineering expertise. The goal is to address critical operational challenges in remote or hazardous environments and enter the rapidly growing eVTOL market for public safety and exploration.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings unveils ambitious AI data centre plans for Malaysia
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings has announced plans to develop Malaysia's first phase of a high-performance AI data centre, starting with a 30MW deployment featuring a 14,000-GPU supercomputing cluster. This initiative aims to strengthen Malaysia's digital infrastructure and establish it as a major AI compute hub in Asia-Pacific. The network is envisioned to connect Malaysia to Singapore, Indonesia, Thailand, Japan, Korea, and Greater China, forming an "ASEAN-to-North Asia AI compute highway."

feed.title: GIBO Announces Strategic Collaboration with E Total Technology Sdn Bhd to Accelerate Deployment of AI Compute Centers Featuring NVIDIA's Most Advanced Chips
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced a strategic collaboration with E Total Technology Sdn Bhd to develop next-generation AI compute centers in Malaysia. These centers will utilize NVIDIA's advanced AI chips and computing architectures to meet the increasing demand for AI training and inference workloads. This partnership aims to strengthen Malaysia's position as a regional AI compute hub, providing scalable, high-performance resources for enterprises and research institutions.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Strategic Collaboration with E Total Technology Sdn Bhd to Accelerate Deployment of AI Compute Centers Featuring NVIDIA's Most Advanced Chips
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced a strategic collaboration with E Total Technology Sdn Bhd to deploy next-generation AI compute centers in Malaysia. These centers will incorporate NVIDIA's advanced AI chips and computing architectures to meet the growing demand for AI training and inference workloads, strengthening Malaysia's position as a regional AI compute hub. E Total Technology Sdn Bhd will lead local execution, site evaluation, and infrastructure development, while GIBO focuses on leveraging high-performance AI deployment.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Strategic Collaboration with E Total Technology Sdn Bhd to Accelerate Deployment of AI Compute Centers Featuring NVIDIA's Most Advanced Chips
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced a strategic collaboration with Malaysia-based E Total Technology Sdn Bhd to establish next-generation artificial intelligence compute centers in Malaysia. These centers will utilize NVIDIA's most advanced AI chips to meet the growing demand for AI training and inference. The partnership aims to enhance Malaysia's AI infrastructure, positioning it as a regional AI compute hub in the Asia-Pacific region.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Development of Initial 30MW + 14,000-GPU AI Data Center, Advancing Malaysia as a Leading Digital AI Hub in Asia-Pacific
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. is developing Malaysia's first phase of a high-performance AI data center, starting with a 30MW deployment and a 14,000-GPU supercomputing cluster. This initiative aims to strengthen Malaysia's digital infrastructure and establish it as a key AI compute hub in the Asia-Pacific region. The project is the first step in GIBO's long-term plan to create a 200MW regional flagship facility and an "ASEAN-to-North Asia AI Compute Highway."

feed.title: GIBO Announces Development of Initial 30MW + 14,000-GPU AI Data Center, Advancing Malaysia as a Leading Digital AI Hub in Asia-Pacific
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced the development of Malaysia's first phase of a high-performance AI data center, featuring a 30MW deployment and a 14,000-GPU supercomputing cluster. This initiative aims to establish Malaysia as a leading digital AI hub in the Asia-Pacific region, supporting large language model training, small and mid-sized model development, and large-scale inference workloads. This is the first step in GIBO's plan to scale to a 100MW multi-zone AI compute campus and ultimately a 200MW regional flagship facility, creating a vast interconnected network across Southeast and North Asia.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Development of Initial 30MW + 14,000-GPU AI Data Center, Advancing Malaysia as a Leading Digital AI Hub in Asia-Pacific
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced its plan to develop Malaysia's first high-performance AI data center, starting with a 30MW deployment and a 14,000-GPU supercomputing cluster. This initiative aims to strengthen Malaysia's digital infrastructure and position it as a major AI compute hub in the Asia-Pacific region. The project is the initial phase of GIBO's broader strategy to establish a 100MW multi-zone AI compute campus and eventually a 200MW regional flagship facility, connecting Malaysia to other key Asian markets.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Development of Initial 30MW + 14,000-GPU AI Data Center, Advancing Malaysia as a Leading Digital AI Hub in Asia-Pacific
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced its strategic initiative to develop Malaysia's first phase of a high-performance AI data center, starting with a 30MW deployment featuring a 14,000-GPU supercomputing cluster. This facility aims to strengthen Malaysia's digital infrastructure and position it as a major AI compute hub in the Asia-Pacific region, with plans to expand to a 200MW regional flagship facility and an interconnected network across Malaysia. The project emphasizes sustainability, advanced cooling methodologies, and dedicated digital pipelines to support AI development and deployment across various industries

feed.title: GIBO Holdings (Nasdaq: GIBO) Restores Compliance; Shares Stay Listed
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings announced it has regained compliance with Nasdaq Listing Rule 5450(a)(1) as confirmed by a letter from Nasdaq dated September 18, 2025. The company's Class A ordinary shares and warrants, traded under GIBO and GIBOW, will continue to be listed on Nasdaq. However, GIBO will remain on a Discretionary Panel Monitor for one year to ensure ongoing compliance.

feed.title: GIBO Signs Core Partnership Agreement With Ricloud, A Nvidia Cloud Partner
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. (GIBO) has signed a core partnership agreement with Ricloud, a Nvidia Cloud Partner, effective November 2025 for an initial three-year term. Under this agreement, GIBO will become Ricloud's core strategic partner in Southeast Asia.

feed.title: GIBO Signs Core Partnership Agreement with Ricloud, a NVIDIA Cloud Partner
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Limited has signed a Core Partnership Agreement with Ricloud AI Inc., an NVIDIA Cloud Partner, to enter the data center and AI cloud markets in Southeast Asia. This strategic alliance grants GIBO priority rights and access to Ricloud's infrastructure, aiming to deploy sovereign AI solutions for governments and enterprises in a region with a rapidly growing digital economy. The partnership is expected to diversify GIBO's revenue streams and leverage Ricloud's significant computing capacity and NVIDIA-certified expertise.

feed.title: GIBO Announces Successful Deployment of On-Chain Anime and Short Film Hosting on Ethereum, Advancing RWA Transformation and Verified Streaming Analytics
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. has successfully deployed an on-chain hosting framework for anime and short films on the Ethereum blockchain. This initiative establishes a verifiable Real World Asset (RWA) framework for digital creative content by linking performance data to immutable blockchain records, ensuring transparency and fair value attribution for creators. The system integrates GIBO Click's analytics and SparkRWA to provide real-time engagement visualization and automated attribution logic across various streaming platforms.

feed.title: GIBO Stock Price and Chart — NASDAQ:GIBO
feed.summary: This article provides a detailed overview of GIBO Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:GIBO) stock performance and key financial metrics. It includes current stock price, historical performance, market capitalization, revenue, net income, and information about the company's operations and employees. Technical analysis and frequently asked questions about GIBO stock are also covered.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings Limited Announces Transfer to Nasdaq Capital Market - The Malaysian Reserve
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Limited (GIBO) has announced its intention to transfer its listing from the Nasdaq Global Market to the Nasdaq Capital Market, effective October 28, 2025. The transfer aims to provide GIBO with more time to regain compliance with Nasdaq's minimum bid price requirement. The company will continue to trade under the symbol "GIBO" and expects no impact on its business operations due to the move.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings announces transfer to Nasdaq Capital Market - TipRanks
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings announced that Nasdaq has approved the transfer of the company's Class A ordinary shares from the Nasdaq Global Market to the Nasdaq Capital Market. The transfer will be effective on October 20, with shares continuing to trade under the symbol "GIBO," and warrants under "GIBOW." This move is not anticipated to impact the trading of the company's securities.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings Limited Announces Transfer to Nasdaq Capital Market - The AI Journal
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Limited announced its Class A ordinary shares will transfer from the Nasdaq Global Market to the Nasdaq Capital Market, effective October 20, 2025. The shares will continue trading under the symbol "GIBO", and warrants under "GIBOW". This transfer is not expected to impact trading, as the Nasdaq Capital Market operates similarly to the Nasdaq Global Market.

feed.title: SparkRWA Expands AI Applications to Empower the Global Green Economy and Drive Sustainable Innovation - Seeking Alpha
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced an expansion of its proprietary AI technologies under the SparkRWA Green Creator Framework to integrate AI into the green economy and sustainable development sectors. This initiative extends GIBO's AI capabilities into green infrastructure intelligence, eco-design optimization, and sustainability verification, aiming to empower creators and enterprises to embed measurable sustainability into their projects. The SparkRWA Green Framework now includes AI-powered environmental analytics, smart energy and design optimization, impact measurement and verification, and creative integration with sustainability.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings Ltd. Expands AI Applications to Empower the Global Green Economy and Drive Sustainable Innovation - MarketScreener
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. announced an expanded application of its proprietary AI technologies under the SparkRWA Green Creator Framework to integrate artificial intelligence into the green economy and sustainable development sectors. This strategic move aims to leverage AI for measuring, optimizing, and accelerating sustainable transformation across various industries. The initiative focuses on empowering creators and enterprises to embed measurable sustainability into projects through AI-powered environmental analytics, smart energy optimization, impact measurement, and creative integration with sustainability.

feed.title: Gibo Holdings Ltd. Unveils SparkRWA Green Creator Economy Initiative - MarketScreener
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. has launched its SparkRWA Green Creator Economy Initiative, expanding its SparkRWA platform to link creative output with measurable real-world sustainable impact. This initiative integrates AI-based verification, data analytics, and multi-currency settlement via GIBO Click, enabling creators and enterprises to tokenize their ideas and environmental projects, driving both economic and ecological growth. Through its Green Integration Framework, SparkRWA aims to foster a global alliance for sustainable creation, establishing a new standard for creators to contribute to culture and the planet.

feed.title: GIBO Unveils SparkRWA Green Creator Economy Initiative -- Pioneering the Integration of Creativity and Sustainability
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. introduced the SparkRWA Green Creator Economy Initiative, expanding its SparkRWA platform to integrate creativity with sustainable impact. This initiative uses an intelligent verification and reward system, powered by AI and GIBO Click, to tokenize creative and environmental ideas, allowing creators to generate economic and ecological value. It aims to foster a global alliance for sustainable creation, supporting green product design, renewable energy, and carbon credit storytelling across various industries.

feed.title: GIBO stock touches 52-week low at $1.89 amid market challenges
feed.summary: Bukit Jalil Global Acquisition 1 (GIBO) stock has hit a new 52-week low of $1.89, representing an 81.58% decline over the past year. This downturn is attributed to a challenging market environment and weak financial health, despite the company's recent innovative developments in tokenizing intellectual property with SparkRWA and integrating AI into short drama production with inspirAI technology.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings Ltd. Launches SparkRWA.ai to Showcase Streaming Platform Trial Results and Advance AI-Powered Monetization Analytics also The Inauguration of the Inspiration Alliance
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. has launched SparkRWA.ai, a digital platform designed to highlight the trial outcomes of its AI-powered monetization analytics engine across various short-drama streaming platforms. This initiative supports GIBO's long-term vision of verifying and tokenizing short-form narrative IP as real-world assets, thus paving the way for a tokenized creative economy. The platform will evolve through analytics, verification, and future tokenization layers to unlock new value for creators and investors in the digital entertainment sector.

feed.title: GIBO Click Successfully Completes Monetization Engine Trial on DramaFlow, Expanding Smart Infrastructure in Short-Drama Platforms
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Ltd. successfully tested its GIBO Click multi-currency settlement and analytics engine on DramaFlow, a short-drama platform. This trial demonstrates GIBO Click's capability to streamline transactions, provide real-time viewer analysis, and offer flexible commerce solutions for global short-form content platforms. The integration enhances DramaFlow's monetization models and reinforces GIBO Click's role in the smart entertainment economy.

feed.title: GIBO Holdings Limited (GIBO) Unveils SparkRWA to Merge IP Tokenization and Asset Verification
feed.summary: GIBO Holdings Limited (NASDAQ:GIBO) has launched SparkRWA, a new platform designed to merge IP tokenization and real-world asset verification for creators. This platform allows for digital recording and protection of original story concepts and verifies physical creative assets using QR/NFC technology. GIBO, known for its AI-driven animation streaming, aims to shift towards infrastructure innovation with SparkRWA, despite a subtle market response and recent stock declines.
